ingredients.name: white long grain rice
ingredients.prep: rinse the rice until all the water runs clear

ingredients.name: egg
ingredients.prep: separate the yolk from the white

steps.task: Add the rice and water to a saucepan or pot. Bring the water to the boil.
Reduce the heat to a simmer, put the lid on the pot, and cook until the rice is done (time will vary according to the rice, check the packaging).
Remove the lid, turn off the heat, then add the sugar and milk. Whisk for a minute or two, until the pan is deglazed.
Return the pot to a medium heat, and whisk gently for about 10-15 minutes until the whisk is revealing the base of the pot.
Turn off the heat, and add the vanilla extract and egg yolk while whisking. Continue to whisk until both are evenly incorporated.
Serve immediately while hot, or chill in the fridge for at least two hours until it is time to serve.
